com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.java.buddy
Class BuddyService

java.lang.Object
  com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.java.App42Service
      com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.java.buddy.BuddyService

public class BuddyService
extends App42Service

Buddy service allows you to send or get request in buddy management on the cloud.
